entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Write UITEST for Issue14052 #17465
    Backlog
  • [regression/7.0.0] [Android] Entry return type not rendering properly #17463
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Build error in .NET 8 RC1 - "XamlC error XFC0126: Resources in ResourceDictionary require a x:Key attribute" for resources that have a key #17461
    .NET 8 GA
  • Label with TextType="Html" will crash on Windows if html is invalid. #17457
  • not running #17454
  • [regression/7.0.0] Entry clear button doesn't work under Android 13 + NET 7.0 #17453
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • HasStickyGroupHeaders property for ListView - similar to GroupHeaderStyle.Plain on iOS #17452
  • Borderless Entry Handler Not Working in .NET MAUI 8.0 #17448
    .NET 8 GA
  • [MacCatalyst] FilePicker focuses on wrong window after selecting file #17447
  • [Mac] [iOS] [Test Flight] Crash on Published IPA #17446
  • Custom BindableRadioGroup is not working #17445
  • [Android] Fix ToolbarUpdatesCorrectlyWhenSwappingMainPageWithAlreadyUsedPage #17444
    .NET 8 Planning

Closed

  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] Entry Numeric keyboard type is not working #17137
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] borders ItemTemplate doesn't show if it includes a border (Using PanCardView) #17252
    .NET 8 GA
  • Unable to compile MAUI Blazor App #17288
  • iOS, Android Border calculates it's size in a wrong way #17275
  • Add back AndroidClientHandler that existed in Xamarin and is now deprecated #17440
  • .Net C# Maui 6 Release Mode Crash "ZIndex" #17245
  • VisualStateManager with TargetName error XFC0001: Cannot resolve property #17380
  • NuGet Automatic Package Restore fails when targeting .net7.0 and platformspecific propertys in csproj #17398
  • BlazorWebView doesn't inherit light/dark theme from OS? #17442
  • CollectionView can't show all items #17274

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix for #11991 - CollectionView SelectedItem BackgroundColor is always Gray on iOS #17464
    community ✨
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #17462
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Dependabot will manage versions on main #17460
  • [net7.0] [tests] Fix image for device tests on Android #17459
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [tests] Don't set xcode path #17451

Merged

  • [net7.0] "Revert default for UseSafeAreaProperty to value from .NET 6 for iOS #17458
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [ci] Bump stable versions on main #17407
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • Revert "Merge main into net8.0" #17456
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17443
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • fix failing test for 17222 #17450
  • Ignore 16561 on catalyst for now #17436
  • [ci] Add MSI transport nugets to sign verify #17335
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • Backport uitests #17420
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Fix DragAndDropCleanupCode #17430

Updated

  • [net7.0] [iOS] Fix ScrollTo method issues #17093
    area/layout 🔲, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Cleanup SwipeView and Propagate BC until we can fix compat layout #17418
    .NET 8 GA
  • [net7.0] Fixed Android's StreamImageSourceService.LoadDrawableAsync() #16640
    area/image :framed_picture:, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Remove Debug and Release Entitlements plists and Replace with Custom Entitlements #16355
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix iOS/Win InputTransparent layouts and add several UI tests #17286
    .NET 8 GA
  • [android] improve performance of Shell flyout opening #15733
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Only return path to font file if it exists, otherwise copy it again. Fixes #16923 #16924
    area/fonts 🅰️, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Split out sharable testing for non-element thing #17387
  • Enable .NET 7 <MauiVersion> to work in .NET 8 SDK projects #17409
    .NET 8 GA
  • Process the hardware enter key as "Done" #16386
    area/controls 🎮, .NET 8 GA
  • Enable WinUI Controls Test Pipeline #17221
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 8 GA
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp from 4.5.0 to 4.7.0 #16888
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, stale, Under Consideration
  • Use Frame command to recalc span bounds #15168
    area/controls 🎮, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Change the impl of the event handler to use a notification center to avoid circular refs. #15064
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, control-editor, Under Consideration
  • Remove Previous TitleView from Toolbar #17353
    .NET 8 GA
  • Test PR for Android label spans Frame and new UI Tests #16228
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, control-label, control-map, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, control-editor, Under Consideration
  • (Windows) ImageButton contents now explicitly stretches #17159
    platform/windows 🪟, area/image :framed_picture:, area/controls 🎮, control-button, stale, Under Consideration
  • Make WinUI FilePicker FutureAccessList more robust #16026
    area/essentials 🍞, stale, Under Consideration
  • [net7.0] Backport Legacy Control Gallery #17434
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Merge net8.0 into main #17412
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add PostNotifications to Permissions #14456
    area/essentials 🍞, stale, Under Consideration
  • Bump the androidx group with 14 updates #17401
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 1 update #17104
    do-not-merge, area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, Under Consideration
  • Remove code from swipe view that kept recreating and re-assigning SwipeItems #17410
    t/bug, control-swipeview, .NET 8 GA
  • Make Android respect power saving/disabled animations #17287
    .NET 8 GA
